SchemaSummary.Description: Objects that will be created on the target YugabyteDB.

DatabaseObjects.ObjectNames: changeset_geom_gist ON public.osm_changeset, created_idx ON public.osm_changeset, tags_idx ON public.osm_changeset, user_id_idx ON public.osm_changeset, user_name_idx ON public.osm_changeset
DatabaseObjects.Details: There are some GIN indexes present in the schema, but GIN indexes are partially supported in YugabyteDB as mentioned in (https://github.com/yugabyte/yugabyte-db/issues/7850) so take a look and modify them if not supported.

SizingRecommendation.ColocatedReasoning: Recommended instance type with 4 vCPU and 16 GiB memory could fit 3 objects (3 tables/materialized views and 0 explicit/implicit indexes) with 6.73 MB size and throughput requirement of 0 reads/sec and 0 writes/sec as colocated. Rest 6 objects (1 tables/materialized views and 5 explicit/implicit indexes) with 0.00 MB size and throughput requirement of 0 reads/sec and 0 writes/sec need to be migrated as range partitioned tables. Non leaf partition tables/indexes and unsupported tables/indexes were not considered.
